name: Norse Noir: Loki's Exile
storyline: Lars Kristiansen is an immigrant from Norway facing tough times living in the United States in the 1920s. Once a low-level courier for the local mafia famed for his amazing luck, Lars is now relegated to making money as best he can as a street magician. With just a few days to pay off his debts, Lars stumbles across a series of events that leave him questioning himself, his friends, and even the very nature of reality itself.
summary: A classic style, hand-drawn adventure game, where the roaring 20s and Scandinavian mythology collide!
